title: Add uploaded partner photo to Partners section

requirements.text: Add the uploaded photo (UMB PHOTO.jpg) as a partner profile image in the Partners section. Store the image as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/umb-photo.jpg and display it in the Partners component as the profile picture for the corresponding partner entry.

quotes: The user has uploaded 1 image(s): UMB PHOTO.jpg

acceptanceCriteria: The image UMB PHOTO.jpg is saved as frontend/public/assets/generated/umb-photo.jpg
The Partners section displays the photo as a partner's profile picture
The photo renders correctly on desktop and mobile layouts

constraints: Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths
Preserve the CA India logo style as noted in project state
nonGoals: Editing or modifying backend partner data schema
Changing the overall visual theme or layout of the Partners section

edits: Crop to a clean square headshot with neutral background (UMB PHOTO.jpg > umb-photo.dim_400x400.jpg)
